019package org.jgrapes.webconlet.oidclogin;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
022import java.net.URL;
023import java.util.HashMap;
024import java.util.Map;
025
026/**
027 * The Class OidcProviderData.
028 */
029@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
030public class OidcProviderData {
031
032    private final String name;
033    private final String displayName;
034    private String clientId;
035    private String secret;
036    private URL issuer;
037    private URL configurationEndpoint;
038    private URL authorizationEndpoint;
039    private URL tokenEndpoint;
040    private URL userinfoEndpoint;
041    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
042    private Map<String, String> popup = new HashMap<>();
043
044    /**
045     * Instantiates a new oidc provider data.
046     *
047     * @param name the name
048     * @param displayName the display name
049     */
050    public OidcProviderData(@JsonProperty("name") String name,
051            @JsonProperty("displayName") String displayName) {
052        super();
053        this.name = name;
054        this.displayName = displayName != null ? displayName : name;
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * Gets the name.
059     *
060     * @return the name
061     */
062    public String name() {
063        return name;
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * Gets the display name.
068     *
069     * @return the display name
070     */
071    public String displayName() {
072        return displayName;
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Gets the client id.
077     *
078     * @return the client id
079     */
080    public String clientId() {
081        return clientId;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Sets the client id.
086     *
087     * @param clientId the new client id
088     */
089    public void setClientId(String clientId) {
090        this.clientId = clientId;
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * Gets the secret.
095     *
096     * @return the secret
097     */
098    public String secret() {
099        return secret;
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * Sets the secret.
104     *
105     * @param secret the new secret
106     */
107    public void setSecret(String secret) {
108        this.secret = secret;
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Gets the issuer.
113     *
114     * @return the issuer
115     */
116    public URL issuer() {
117        return issuer;
118    }
119
120    /**
121     * Sets the issuer.
122     *
123     * @param issuer the new issuer
124     */
125    public void setIssuer(URL issuer) {
126        this.issuer = issuer;
127    }
128
129    /**
130     * Gets the configuration endpoint.
131     *
132     * @return the configuration endpoint
133     */
134    public URL configurationEndpoint() {
135        return configurationEndpoint;
136    }
137
138    /**
139     * Sets the configuration endpoint.
140     *
141     * @param configurationEndpoint the new configuration endpoint
142     */
143    public void setConfigurationEndpoint(URL configurationEndpoint) {
144        this.configurationEndpoint = configurationEndpoint;
145    }
146
147    /**
148     * Gets the authorization endpoint.
149     *
150     * @return the authorization endpoint
151     */
152    public URL authorizationEndpoint() {
153        return authorizationEndpoint;
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * Sets the authorization endpoint.
158     *
159     * @param authorizationEp the new authorization endpoint
160     */
161    public void setAuthorizationEndpoint(URL authorizationEp) {
162        this.authorizationEndpoint = authorizationEp;
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Gets the token endpoint.
167     *
168     * @return the token endpoint
169     */
170    public URL tokenEndpoint() {
171        return tokenEndpoint;
172    }
173
174    /**
175     * Sets the token endpoint.
176     *
177     * @param tokenEndpoint the new token endpoint
178     */
179    public void setTokenEndpoint(URL tokenEndpoint) {
180        this.tokenEndpoint = tokenEndpoint;
181    }
182
183    /**
184     * Gets the userinfo endpoint.
185     *
186     * @return the userinfo endpoint
187     */
188    public URL userinfoEndpoint() {
189        return userinfoEndpoint;
190    }
191
192    /**
193     * Sets the userinfo endpoint.
194     *
195     * @param userinfoEndpoint the new userinfo endpoint
196     */
197    public void setUserinfoEndpoint(URL userinfoEndpoint) {
198        this.userinfoEndpoint = userinfoEndpoint;
199    }
200
201    @Override
202    public String toString() {
203        return "Oidc Provider " + name + " (" + displayName
204            + ") at " + configurationEndpoint;
205    }
206
207    /**
208     * Gets the popup options.
209     *
210     * @return the popup
211     */
212    public Map<String, String> popup() {
213        return popup;
214    }
215
216    /**
217     * Sets the popup option.
218     *
219     * @param popup the popup
220     */
221    public void setPopup(Map<String, String> popup) {
222        this.popup = popup;
223    }
224
225}
